Just referencing an issue I came across in search parameter defintions where the operator precendence of as and | seems to not be what I would have naturally expected
no, but I can also see some reason why it's that way. Can't have your cake and eat it too....
do you want to add a test case for this to make sure parsers have the precedence right? because it looks like i don't....
